chapters.title: Chapter 12: Across the TarenChapter 13: Choices
chapters.info: Lara Ayellan, p. 153 (163)—One of Egwene's friends. Egwene asked Moiraine if she can channel when Moiraine said there was another woman in her village who could do so. She does not realize that the woman Moiraine was referring to was Nynaeve. See also Thane, Kari.
